234234.eventDeck: [{"id":34,"flavorText":"The dwarf merchant Garz meets one of the heroes and offers him a trade.","desc":"One of the heroes can now purchase 10 willpower points in exchange for 2 strength points. You can decide as a group which hero that will be."}]
